value:
$WmMPID_アーサー,ch06_33_Arthur_M_Normal,Face|Tine, are you all right? You're not
hurt, are you?$k$p$WmMPID_ティニー,ch06_32_Tiny_F_Normal,Face|I'm fine, Brother. Actually...I'm more
concerned about our cousin Ishtar...$k$p$WmMPID_スカサハ,ch06_34_Scathach_M_Normal,Face|Look at her. She's over there drawing
quite a bit of attention to herself.$k$p$WmMPID_開花イシュタル,ch06_11_Ishtar_F_Bloom01,Face|You bandits who threaten the
peace of this kingdom... Feel the
judgment of the Thunder Goddess!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I-incredible! She felled all those
enemies with a single attack!$k$p$EFace_Smile|Woah! I guess she isn't called the
Thunder Goddess for nothing.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|It's very reassuring to have such a
powerful Hero fighting on our side.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|She requested to be put on the
front lines, so I did as I she wished.
I had no idea she could do...that.$k$p$WmMPID_アーサー,ch06_33_Arthur_M_Normal,Face|Only the descendants of the
legendary crusader Thrud can
use the thunder magic Mjölnir...$k$pSeeing it up close like this...
Her power is terrifying.$k$p$WmMPID_スカサハ,ch06_34_Scathach_M_Normal,Face|I do find it a bit strange that we are
fighting as allies with Princess
Ishtar now.$k$p$WmMPID_開花イシュタル,ch06_11_Ishtar_F_Bloom01,Face|I am not finished with you yet.
You cannot escape my thunder!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ah! Ishtar! It isn't safe for you to rush
in alone!$k$p$WmMPID_ティニー,ch06_32_Tiny_F_Normal,Face|Ishtar, wait! Arthur, we have
to go after her!$k$p$WmMPID_アーサー,ch06_33_Arthur_M_Normal,Face|Y-yes, all right!$k$p$WmMPID_開花イシュタル,ch06_11_Ishtar_F_Bloom01,Face|...All I can do is fight.$k$pFight, fight, and fight some more...
That is my entire existence, now...$k$p
